channel.title: SyriaX (minecraft)
channel.description:
[center]Hello everyone and welcome to Minecraft server SyriaX![/center]
[center][img]http://forum.syriax.info/images/server-titlee.png[/img][/center]
[b]Forums[/b] - * [b]Client[/b] - [u][url=http://www.minecraft.net/]client download buy![/url][/u] [i]-Download the paid one from here![/i] [b]Cracked client[/b] - [u][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yQk_sMKoasg]Client[/url][/u] [i]-Download the cracked one from here![/i]
When you log in the Minecraft client you will get options follow this to log in the server.
Multiplayer > (enter the server ip no the box) syriax.no-ip.org > Connect
[center][u][i][b]Server Information![/b][/i][/u] Ip: syriax.no-ip.org[/center]
[b]About the owner![/b]
Hello everyone my in-game name is hontiris1 and on this forums currently, i have originated from runescape private servers. I had about 7 servers and kept them all open for months, my longest time hosting a server is syriax witch was the name for my RSPS that lasted for 7 months until i decided to come and try minecraft out. I play RuneScape but i decided not to anymore and get more in to this Minecraft gaming experience that i hope it turns out well for me. I currently code C++, C, and java, hope it gives me an advantage on the minecraft private server.
[i][b]Live Support System[/b][/i]
If you are in need of help or have any questions, please feel free to use the live support/live chat on the forums. There will be 2-3 representatives on the live support 24/7 and able to speak 2-3 languages English, spanish, Italian.
[i][b]VPS specs[/b][/i]
Dedicated RAM: [center]2048 MB[/center] Remote Desktop Connection : [center]2[/center] Disk Space: [center]50 GB[/center] Bandwidth/mo.: [center]2000 GB[/center] Dedicated IP Address: [center]2[/center]
[b][i]Pictures:[/i][/b]
(Take them and post them on the thread, i will add them here)
thanks.
